import React, {useState} from 'react' import profileImg from './profile-pic.png' export default function AddUdhariWS(props) { const [UdhariAmount, setUdhariAmount] = useState(0); const [UdhariStatus, setUdhariStatus] = useState(""); const [username, setUsername] = useState(""); const [contact, setContact] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [upi_id, setUpi_id] = useState(""); const MoneyReceived = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setUdhariStatus("Udhari_to_pay") setUdhariAmount(prompt("Enter amount received by you.")) props.addStatusHandler(prevState => !prevState) } const MoneyPayed = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setUdhariStatus("Udhari_to_get") setUdhariAmount(prompt("Enter amount payed to you.")) props.addStatusHandler(prevState => !prevState) } return (
{setUsername(e.target.value)}} required />
{setContact(e.target.value)}} />
{setEmail(e.target.value)}} />
{setUpi_id(e.target.value)}} />
{setAmount(e.target.value)}}/>
) }
